doc.title: Exception

value.content: An exception is a condition that interrupts normal code execution. In JavaScript syntax errors are a very common source of exceptions.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Exception handling on Wikipedia

doc.summary: An exception is a condition that interrupts normal code execution. In JavaScript syntax errors are a very common source of exceptions.
